title: Marta Wise, child survivor of Auschwitz, dies at 88
description: She turned 10 years old the day of her arrest and was subjected to the medical experiments of Nazi doctor Josef Mengele.

title: Prigozhin says war in Ukraine has backfired, warns of Russian revolution
description: Fresh off his victory in Bakhmut, the Wagner mercenary group leader told an interviewer that Russia's war had strengthened Ukraine's military and could spur violent unrest against Russia's elite.

title: 95-year-old Australian woman dies after being Tasered by police
description: The officer who allegedly used the Taser has been charged with recklessly causing grievous bodily harm, assault occasioning actual bodily harm and common assault.

title: Germany conducts raids against climate activists, alleging criminality
description: The Last Generation, known for throwing food at art and gluing themselves to roads to protest lack of action of climate change, may be treated as a criminal enterprise.

title: Boris Johnson referred to police for allegedly breaking covid rules — again
description: Former British prime minister Boris Johnson faces yet more allegations that he broke his government’s own coronavirus rules during the pandemic.

title: China prepares for new wave of covid cases from XBB variant
description: As immunity from the last big wave of infections wanes with the new XBB variant, China braces for a new surge of covid cases.

title: Pegasus spyware reaches into Mexican president’s inner circle
description: The surveillance technology was found on the cellphones of officials investigating the 2014 disappearance of 43 college students and victims of the 20th-century “Dirty War” against a left-wing insurgency.

title: Miami zoo apologizes after treatment of kiwi bird ‘offended a nation’
description: A petition to "help save" Paora garnered more than 10,000 signatures after a video showed visitors petting the flightless, nocturnal bird.

title: Ukraine live briefing: U.S. distances itself from Belgorod incident after Humvees seen on Russian side
description: Damaged U.S.-made Humvees were seen in a video on the Russian side of the border near Belgorod, which Russia says was attacked by pro-Ukrainian fighters.

title: Guam issues flash flooding warning as Typhoon Mawar approaches
description: Intense rainfall is expected through Thursday as the U.S. Pacific territory readies for one of the worst storms it has faced in decades.

title: Despite war, Ukraine allows Russian oil and gas to cross its territory
description: Even after a brutal invasion and tens of thousands of war dead, Ukraine insists it must maintain some commercial ties with Russia because European neighbors need the energy supplies.

title: The unique absurdity of the U.S.’s looming debt default
description: Denmark is the only industrialized democracy other than the United States to have a debt limit set at a nominal value, but Danish debt is never the subject of complicated political wrangling.
